text: Kailasavadivoo Sivan (born 14 April 1957) is an Indian space scientist and the chairperson of the Indian Space Research Organization. == Early life == He was born in Mela Sarakkalvilai, near Nagercoil in Kanyakumari district of Tamil Nadu state of India. == Awards == * Dr. A.P.J. Abdul Kalam Award, 2019. * IEEE Simon Ramo Medal, shared with Byrana N. Suresh, 2020. == References == Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Indian physicists
title: Kailasavadivoo Sivan
